Initialise Model Runs for PDA

Source: R/pda.utils.R
pda.init.run.Rd

Initialise Model Runs for PDA

Usage

pda.init.run(
  settings,
  con,
  my.write.config,
  workflow.id,
  params,
  n = ifelse(is.null(dim(params)), 1, nrow(params)),
  run.names = paste("run", 1:n, sep = ".")
)

Arguments

settings

a PEcAn settings list

con

DB connection

my.write.config

model write config fcn name

workflow.id

workflow ID

params

parameters of the run

n

number of runs

run.names

names of runs

Value

Vector of run IDs for all model runs that were set up (including write.configs)

Author

Ryan Kelly

On this page

Developed by Mike Dietze, Istem Fer, Ryan Kelly.
